short_summary: Goods procurement for the purchase of equipment and trailers.
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 05-July-2023 at 14:00 EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for the purchase of two (2) Freighter Canoes with motors and two (2) boat trailers. The 3rd Canadian Ranger Patrol Group (3 CRPG) operates in the Northern regions of Ontario, on land and on the water (rivers and lakes), all across this province. A bid must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title
W0113-23CS33 - Purchasing of Freighter Canoes with Motors and Trailers
## Solicitation Information
* Solicitation Number: WS3833406779
* Publication Date: June 19, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: July 5, 2023, 14:00 EDT
* Amendment Date: June 19, 2023
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
## Goods and Services Information
* Procurement Category: Goods
* Classification: Canoes and Kayaks
* Goods and Services Code: 25111804
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except NCR)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Request for Proposal
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the purchase of two (2) Freighter Canoes with motors and two (2) boat trailers. The 3rd Canadian Ranger Patrol Group (3 CRPG) operates in the Northern regions of Ontario, on land and on the water. Bidders must comply with the requirements of the solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria.

## Evaluation Criteria
Bid submissions will be evaluated based on the lowest evaluated price.

## Submission Requirements
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the tender closing date and time. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

## Contact Information
* Name: Fong, Tony (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [tony.fong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tony.fong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Ariba Discovery Posting: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16625242?extsite=MTY2MjUyNDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16625242?extsite=MTY2MjUyNDJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)  Well, you are quite a jack of all trades (contributor of all doit substitution skills writinig!! just a heads-up.

So here is the rewritten Content, as re4std by you in the Markdown Format.
 
Government Tender Announcement
================================

# Title
W0113-23CS33 Purchasing of Freighter Canoes with Motors and Trailers
